name: WARTILE
description: Wartile is a cool-down based strategy game in which you control a warband of Viking figurines in a miniature universe inspired by Norse mythology. Unravel its secrets and rein the powers of the gods.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel dual Core i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad Core Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or RX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
